FUNC.NAME: macroPdfConvertToPdf417
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the macroPdfConvertToPdf417 property.

PARAM.NAME: macroPdfConvertToPdf417
PARAM.DESC: If true, MacroPDF barcodes will be converted to PDF417 codes.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner and sets macroPdfConvertToPdf417 property
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="macroPdf:enabled; pdf417:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="macroPdfConvertToPdf417:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

ADDITIONAL.PLATFORM: All supported devices except: Android devices.
ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports MacroPDF and PDF417.
